title: Start Your EU Business
description: We help you register your company quickly and easily.

steps.step1: Choose the right legal structure (GmbH, UG, Ltd, etc.)
steps.step3: Submit the application to the business registry
steps.step4: Obtain a tax ID and open a business bank account
steps.step5: Start operations and stay compliant with local regulations

benefitsTitle: Why Start a Business in the EU?

benefits.benefit1: Access to a large EU market
benefits.benefit3: Lower corporate taxes in some EU countries
benefits.benefit4: Easier access to international banking and funding

documents.document2: Proof of address (utility bill, bank statement)
documents.document3: Company bylaws and articles of incorporation

ctaText: Ready to establish your business in the EU?
